params.nft: An array of ERC-721 and / or ERC-1155 addresses.
params.tokenID: Token Ids of the NFTs msg.sender wishes to accept the asks on.

params.nft: An array of ERC-721 and / or ERC-1155 addresses.
params.tokenID: Token Ids of the NFTs msg.sender wishes to accept the bids on.

params.nft: An array of ERC-721 and / or ERC-1155 addresses.
params.tokenID: Token Ids of the NFTs msg.sender wishes to cancel the asks on.

params.nft: An array of ERC-721 and / or ERC-1155 addresses.
params.tokenID: Token Ids of the NFTs msg.sender wishes to cancel the bids on.

createAsk(address[],uint256[],uint256[],.details: Creating an ask requires msg.sender to have at least one qty of (`nft`, `tokenID`).

params.nft: An array of ERC-721 and / or ERC-1155 addresses.
params.price: Prices at which the seller is willing to sell the NFTs.
params.to: Addresses for which the sale is reserved. If zero address, then anyone can accept.
params.tokenID: Token Ids of the NFTs msg.sender wishes to sell.

params.nft: An array of ERC-721 and / or ERC-1155 addresses.
params.price: Prices at which the buyer is willing to buy the NFTs.
params.tokenID: Token Ids of the NFTs msg.sender wishes to buy.

acceptAsk(address[],uint256[]).notice: Seller placed ask(s), you (buyer) are fine with the terms. You accept their ask by sending the required msg.value and indicating the id of the token(s) you are purchasing.

acceptBid(address[],uint256[]).notice: You are the owner of the NFTs, someone submitted the bids on them. You accept one or more of these bids.

cancelAsk(address[],uint256[]).notice: Cancels ask(s) that the seller previously created.

cancelBid(address[],uint256[]).notice: Cancels bid(s) that the msg.sender previously created.

createAsk(address[],uint256[],uint256[],.notice: Creates an ask for (`nft`, `tokenID`) tuple for `price`, which can be reserved for `to`, if `to` is not a zero address.

createBid(address[],uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Creates a bid on (`nft`, `tokenID`) tuple for `price`.

withdraw().notice: Sellers can receive their payment by calling this function.
